full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services for Southern Alberta
{}
= {}
# Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4550437567
* Solicitation Number: WS4550437567
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: April 22, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2025

# Tender Status

This tender has expired.

# Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified Offerors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for temporary help services for government departments and agencies in Southern Alberta. The services will be provided on an as-and-when-requested basis for a period of one year, commencing June 1, 2024.

The Temporary Help Services Standing Offer Agreement will cover the provision of temporary personnel services to support federal government departments and agencies in the regions of Lethbridge, Calgary, and Medicine Hat.

The procurement includes a voluntary set-aside for Aboriginal Business and is aligned with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

# Offer Requirements

* Support federal government departments and agencies in the regions of Lethbridge, Calgary, and Medicine Hat
* Provide temporary personnel services as required
* Meet the required Procurement Standards and the Aboriginal Business Sub-contracting Requirements

# Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: May 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2025

# Contact Information

* Andrew Hemy, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Ariba Discovery Posting: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19478557?extsite=MTk0Nzg1NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Choi(?) 
Note: I kept Choi at the end because I was unsure.
